alert.note: Alert for Lee (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 11 at 9:56PM EDT until June 11 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 268 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN TENNESSEE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 COUNTIES IN EAST TENNESSEE ANDERSON BLOUNT CLAIBORNE GRAINGER HANCOCK KNOX LOUDON MCMINN MEIGS MONROE RHEA ROANE UNION IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHWEST VIRGINIA LEE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALCOA, ARTHUR, ATHENS, BEAN STATION, BEARDEN, BIG SPRING, BRADBURY, BULLET CREEK, CLAIRFIELD, CLEAR WATER, CLINTON, DAYTON, DENTVILLE, EAGLE FURNACE, ETOWAH, EVANSTON, EVENSVILLE, FAIRVIEW, GRANDVIEW, HAPPY VALLEY, HARRIMAN, HARROGATE-SHAWANEE, HOWARD QUARTER, KINGSTON, KNOXVILLE, KYLES FORD, LAKE FOREST, LENOIR CITY, LONE MOUNTAIN, LOUDON, LUTTRELL, MADISONVILLE, MARYVILLE, MAYNARDVILLE, NORRIS LAKE, OAK RIDGE, OLD WASHINGTON, OLIVER SPRINGS, PAULETTE, ROCKWOOD, ROSE HILL, ROSE HILL, SANDLICK, SHARPS CHAPEL, SNEEDVILLE, SPRING CITY, SPRINGDALE, SWEETWATER, AND TREADWAY.
